author.description: The name of the author of the plugin.

version.description: The version of the plugin. This should be incremented when updating the plugin.

id.description: The uuid of the pack. This should be unique to the plugin.

api_version.description: You can omit this attribute to always use the latest API version (currently: 2). We recommend to always specifically set it though.

link.description: The link attribute is optional and allows you to provide a link to an external webpage which appears in bridge.'s UI.

install.description: List files bridge. is supposed to install to the user's projects
